original_body_lines: Don’t skip a beat The Rotary Club of Colombo West and the Rotary Club of Colombo Metropolitan held a media brefing today at the Lanka Hospital auditorium, Colombo 5, on the children’s heart surgery project named ‘Don’t Skip A Beat’. High Commissioner of India to Sri Lanka, Gopal Baglay was also present at the event. Pix by Kithsiri de Mel
